content: challenge in retail data management: the manual classification and organization of data sets. It automates this process by using machine learning and NLP to identify patterns, classify content, and apply relevant business tags. For example, transactional data sets can be automatically tagged with attributes like “Region: North America”, “Quarter: Q3”, and “Product Category: Electronics”. This automation reduces the burden on data stewards while helping ensure that data sets remain consistently organized. As a result, analysts can quickly locate data sets that meet their criteria, even in expansive catalogs.
